name: Frequency (cdeer)
description:
Cavejam Team proudly presents their first foray into gamejams.

Made for GMTK 2020 with the theme "Out Of Control"

Frequency is a Shmup where on each hit, instead of losing lives you partially lose the ability to control your ship, making it so that after every hit things get more and more difficult.

CONTROLS

  • ARROW KEYS: Movement (Vertical and Horizontal)
  • Z: Shoot
  • X: Bomb (3 Bombs)

Cavejam team is:

  • CDeer: Programming
  • Mediocremerits: Programming
  • RebobTheBob: Art Assets
  • SecretlyAwesome: Programming, Music
  • RushXCalibur: Programming
